price: 29. Toen wees zij naar hem. Zij zeiden: “Hoe kunnen wij met iemand praten die nog een kind in de wieg is?”
arabic: فَأَشَارَتۡ إِلَيۡهِۖ قَالُواْ كَيۡفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-ashārat ilayhi qālū kayfa nukallimu man kāna fī al-mahdi ṣabiyyan
